definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: In a case of hypomagnesemia in a cow there is no physical lesion .
sentences.chinese: 一例低鎂血癥病牛並無器質性損害。

sentences.english: Objective To study the relationship of functional phonation disorders and laryngeal organic diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討功能性發聲障礙與喉器質性病變的關係。

sentences.english: But what is smart the guardian to pay attention is should examine the audiences to rule out the organic pathological change's possibility.
sentences.chinese: 但俏得家長注意的是應檢衆排除器質性病變的可能。

sentences.english: Objective To study whether a physical cricopharyngeal bar is related to aging.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究器質性環嚥肌壓跡與老齡化是否有相關性。

sentences.english: This condition may be of organic or psychologic origin.
sentences.chinese: 這種病症可能具有器質性或心理學起因。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the reason of circulation system symptom of patients with non-physical disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討非器質性疾病患者循環系統症狀的原因。

sentences.english: Experience on the Treatment of Pathologic Ventricular Tachycardia by Radiofrequency Catheter Ablation.
sentences.chinese: 器質性心臟病室性心動過速的導管射頻消融治療。

sentences.english: The result of the study demonstrated that organic injury occurred in myocardium after high tension electricity injury.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果證實高壓電損傷後心肌可發生器質性損害。

sentences.english: The pathogenesis of foreign body sensation of the pharynx can be divided into organic and nonorganic two groups.
sentences.chinese: 咽異常感的病因分爲器質性和非器質性。

sentences.english: The pathogenesis of foreign body sensation of the pharynx can be divided into organic and nonorganic two groups.
sentences.chinese: 咽異常感的病因分爲器質性和非器質性。

sentences.english: Organic personality change was correlated with fracture of skull.
sentences.chinese: 器質性人格改變與合併顱骨骨折明顯相關。

sentences.english: Old age and organic brain disorder are major risk factors for delirium in the elderly.
sentences.chinese: 老年和器質性腦疾病的主要危險因素譫妄老人。
